Scientific events

Upcoming events:

  • València International Bayesian Analysis Summer School VIBASS 8, València, Spain, July 2025. Workshop: Bayesian Data Analysis. Instructor.

  • Conference of the DGPs Methods and Evaluation Section 2025, Berlin, Germany, September 2025. Workshop: Bayesian Data Analysis. Instructor.

Past events:

  • 7th Joint Statistical Meeting of the Deutsche Arbeitsgemeinschaft Statistik DAGStat 2025, Berlin, Germany, March 2025. Contributed Talk: Contributed talk: Generalized Decomposition priors on R2.

  • 7th Joint Statistical Meeting of the Deutsche Arbeitsgemeinschaft Statistik DAGStat 2025, Berlin, Germany, March 2025. Tutorial: Bayesian Data Analysis Workshop Instructors: Javier Aguilar, Luna Fazio.

  • German Probability and Statistics Days (GPSD) 2025, Dresden, Germany. Contributed Talk: Dependency Aware Shrinkage priors.

  • International Conference on Statistics and Data Science ICSDS 2024, Nice, France, December 2024. Contributed talk: Generalized Decomposition priors on R2.

  • Bayesian Methods for the Social Sciences II, Amsterdam, Netherlands, October 2024. Poster: Generalized Decomposition priors on R2.

  • ISBA World Meeting 2024, Venice, Italy. Poster: Generalized Decomposition priors on R2. (Accepted, but did not attend)

  • Bernoulli-ims 11th World Congress in Probability and Statistics 2024, Bochum, Germany. Contributed Talk: Generalized Decomposition priors on R2. (Accepted, but did not attend)

  • ELLIS Society Mobility Fund Visiting scholar Department of Computer Science Aalto University Helsinki, Finland. Project: Grouped R2 decomposition priors. Collaboration with Aki Vehtari and David Kohns (In preparation)

  • International Conference on Multilevel Analysis 2024, Utrecht, Netherlands. Contributed Talk: Intuitive Joint Priors for Bayesian Multilevel Models.

  • NordStat 2023, Gothenburg, Sweden. Contributed Talk: Intuitive Joint Priors for Bayesian Multilevel Models.

  • BayesComp 2023, Levi, Finland. Poster: Intuitive Joint Priors for Bayesian Multilevel Models.

  • German Probability and Statistics Days (GPSD) 2023, Essen, Germany. Contributed Talk: Intuitive Joint Priors for Bayesian Multilevel Models.

  • International Conference on Statistics and Data Science ICSDS 2022 , Florence, Italy 2022. Invited Talk: Intuitive Joint Priors for Bayesian Multilevel Models. Student travel award given by the IMS.
